plasma_start.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                PLASMA_START
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision: 1.5  (Previously: randion)
00006 !
00007 !  Sets up 3D random distribution of plasma particles
00008 !  according to target_geometry
00009 ! 
00010 ! ==============================================
00011 
00012 subroutine plasma_start(i1, n, nglobal, label_off, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00013      rho0, Zion, mass_ratio, vt, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00014      number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, q_part, m_part, a_ave )
00015 
00016   use treevars
00017   use utils
00018 
00019   implicit none
00020 
00021   integer, intent(in) :: i1 ! particle index start
00022   integer, intent(in) :: n  ! # particles to set up
00023   integer, intent(in) :: nglobal  ! global # particles of this species (determining charge weight)
00024   integer, intent(in) :: label_off ! offset for pelabel
00025   integer, intent(in) :: target_geometry ! geometry
00026   integer, intent(in) :: velocity_config ! Maxwellian/cold start switch
00027   integer, intent(in) :: idim ! # dimensions
00028   real, intent(in) :: rho0 ! plasma density
00029   real, intent(in) :: Zion ! particle atomic charge (-1, Zion)
00030   real, intent(in) :: vt ! thermal or drift velocity
00031   real, intent(in) :: mass_ratio ! mass ratio (m_q/m_e)
00032   real, intent(in) :: x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere ! container params
00033   real, intent(in) :: plasma_centre(3) ! target offset vector
00034   real, intent(out) :: Vplas, Aplas, Qplas ! Plasma volume, area, charge
00035   real, intent(out) :: q_part, m_part, a_ave ! Derived particle charge, mass, spacing
00036   integer, intent(out) :: number_faces   ! # faces of target container
00037 
00038   integer              :: i, j, face_nr, n1
00039   integer              :: idum, iseed1, iseed2, iseed3, p, k, nx, ny
00040   integer :: nep0, nip0
00041   real*8               :: xt, yt, zt, radius, dpx, s, rt
00042   real*8 :: c_status
00043   real, dimension(1:3) :: r_temp
00044   real :: pi=3.141592654
00045   logical :: start_debug=.false.
00046 
00047   iseed1 = -1 - label_off      ! Select seed depending on PE and offset
00048 
00049   if (start_debug) then
00050     write (ipefile, '(a,3i8)') 'Seed: ', iseed1
00051     write(ipefile,'(a,i5/6(a20,i8/),8(a20,f12.3/),a20,3f12.3)') "Call parameters on PE ",me, &
00052         "start index:",i1, &
00053         "# parts:",n, &
00054         "label offset:",label_off, &
00055         "geometry:",target_geometry, &
00056         "vel. config:",velocity_config,&
00057         "dimensions:",idim, &
00058         "density:",rho0, &
00059         "Z:",zion, &
00060         "vthermal:",vt,&
00061         "mass ratio:",mass_ratio, &
00062         "xplas:",x_plasma,&
00063         "yplas:",y_plasma,&
00064         "zplas:",z_plasma,&
00065         "radius:",r_sphere,&
00066         "centre:",plasma_centre
00067   endif
00068 
00069   !  Predefined geometries:
00070   !  ---------------------
00071   !       0 = random slab
00072   !       1 = random sphere
00073   !       2 = random disc
00074   !       3 = random wire
00075   !       4 = ellipsoid
00076   !       5 = wedge
00077   !       6, 26 = hemisphere
00078   !       11 = hollow sphere
00079   !       16, 36 = hollow hemisphere
00080 
00081 
00082   !  Define target container parameters: volume, area, centre, # faces
00083 
00084   geom_container: select case(target_geometry)
00085 
00086   case(0) ! slab
00087      Vplas = x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma  ! plasma volume
00088      Aplas = x_plasma * y_plasma ! plasma area
00089      number_faces = 6
00090 
00091   case(1) ! sphere
00092      Vplas = 4 * pi * r_sphere**3 / 3.
00093      Aplas = pi*r_sphere**2
00094      number_faces = 1
00095 
00096   case(11) ! hollow sphere
00097      Vplas = (4 * pi / 3.) * (r_sphere**3 - (r_sphere - x_plasma)**3)
00098      Aplas = pi*(r_sphere**2-(r_sphere-x_plasma)**2)
00099      number_faces = 2
00100 
00101   case(2) ! disc
00102      Vplas = pi * r_sphere**2 * x_plasma
00103      Aplas = x_plasma*y_plasma
00104      number_faces = 3
00105 
00106   case(12) ! hollow tube
00107      Vplas = pi * (r_sphere**2 - (r_sphere-z_plasma)**2) * x_plasma
00108      Aplas = pi*(r_sphere**2 - (r_sphere-z_plasma)**2)
00109      number_faces = 4
00110 
00111   case(3) ! wire
00112      Vplas = pi * r_sphere**2 * z_plasma
00113      Aplas = pi*r_sphere**2
00114      number_faces = 3
00115 
00116   case(13) ! hollow wire
00117      Vplas = pi * (r_sphere**2 - (r_sphere-x_plasma)**2) * z_plasma
00118      Aplas = pi*(r_sphere**2 - (r_sphere-x_plasma)**2)
00119      number_faces = 4
00120 
00121   case(4) ! ellipsoid
00122      Vplas = 4 * pi * x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma / 3.
00123      Aplas = pi*x_plasma*y_plasma*2
00124      number_faces = 1
00125 
00126   case(5) ! wedge
00127      Vplas = .5 * x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma
00128      Aplas = .5*x_plasma*y_plasma
00129      number_faces = 5
00130 
00131   case(6,26) ! hemisphere
00132      Vplas = 4 * pi * r_sphere**3 / 6.
00133      Aplas = pi*r_sphere**2/2.
00134      number_faces = 2
00135 
00136 
00137   case(16,36) ! hollow hemisphere
00138      Vplas = (4 * pi / 6.) * (r_sphere**3 - (r_sphere - x_plasma)**3)
00139      Aplas = pi/2.*(r_sphere**2-(r_sphere-x_plasma)**2)
00140      number_faces = 3
00141 
00142   case default ! slab
00143      Vplas = x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma  ! plasma volume
00144      Aplas = x_plasma * y_plasma ! plasma area
00145      number_faces = 6
00146 
00147   end select geom_container
00148 
00149 ! ensure soft exit if particle # = zero
00150   if (n==0) then
00151      q_part=1.
00152      m_part=1.
00153      a_ave=1.
00154      return
00155   endif
00156 
00157   !  Initialise particles according to target geometry
00158 
00159 
00160  i=0 
00161 
00162   do while (i < n)
00163 
00164      geom_parts: select case (target_geometry)
00165      case(0, 5) ! slab or wedge 
00166         xt = .5 * x_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)
00167         yt = .5 * y_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)         
00168         zt = .5 * z_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00169 
00170      case(1, 11) ! sphere and hollow sphere
00171         xt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)
00172         yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)        
00173         zt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00174 
00175      case(2,12) ! disc, tube
00176         xt = .5 * x_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)
00177         yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)         
00178         zt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00179 
00180      case(3,13) ! wire
00181         xt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)         
00182         yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)
00183         zt = .5 * z_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00184 
00185      case(4) ! ellipsoid
00186         xt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) * x_plasma + plasma_centre(1)
00187         yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) * y_plasma + plasma_centre(2)
00188         zt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) * z_plasma + plasma_centre(3)
00189 
00190      case(6, 16, 26, 36) ! hemisphere and hollow hemisphere
00191         xt = .5 * r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)
00192         yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)
00193         zt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00194 
00195      end select geom_parts
00196 
00197      ! check if the new particle is inside container
00198      ! - if so then add it
00199 
00200      do face_nr = 1, number_faces
00201         call face(  (/xt, yt, zt/), c_status, face_nr, &
00202                     target_geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre )
00203 
00204         if (c_status .ge. 0.) exit ! particle outside
00205      end do
00206 
00207      if (c_status .lt. 0) then
00208         i=i+1
00209         p=i+i1-1
00210         z(p) = zt 
00211         y(p) = yt
00212         x(p) = xt
00213      end if
00214   end do
00215 
00216   ! scramble indices to remove correlations
00217   iseed3 = -17 - 4 * me -i1
00218   n1 = n
00219 
00220   !  exclude odd one out
00221   if (mod(n,2) .ne. 0) then
00222      n1 = n1 - 1
00223   end if
00224 
00225   do i = 1, n1
00226      p = i + i1-1
00227      k = n1 * rano(iseed3) + i1
00228      xt = x(p)
00229      yt = y(p)
00230      zt = z(p)
00231      x(p) = x(k)
00232      y(p) = y(k)
00233      z(p) = z(k)
00234      x(k) = xt
00235      y(k) = yt
00236      z(k) = zt
00237   end do
00238 
00239 
00240   ! Derive electron/ion charges and masses from target parameters
00241 
00242   if (idim==3) then    ! 3D
00243 
00244      Qplas = Vplas*rho0      ! total target charge
00245      q_part = Qplas/nglobal   ! particle charge
00246      m_part = mass_ratio*abs(q_part) ! particle mass
00247      a_ave = (Vplas/max(1,nglobal))**(1./3.)  ! ave. spacing
00248 
00249   else        ! 2D - use areal density instead of volume
00250 
00251      Qplas = Aplas*rho0
00252      q_part = Qplas/nglobal   ! particle charge
00253      m_part = mass_ratio*abs(q_part) ! particle mass
00254      a_ave = (Aplas/max(1,nglobal))**(1./2.) ! ave spacing
00255   endif
00256 
00257 
00258   q(i1:i1+n-1)       = q_part     ! charge
00259   m(i1:i1+n-1)       = m_part     ! mass
00260   pepid(i1:i1+n-1)   = me    ! processor ID
00261   pelabel(i1:i1+n-1) = label_off + (/(i, i = 1, n)/) ! unique labels
00262 
00263 
00264 
00265   velocities: select case (velocity_config)
00266 
00267   case(0) ! Default is cold start
00268      call cold_start(i1,n)
00269 
00270   case(1) ! isotropic Maxwellian
00271 
00272      if (vt > 0) then
00273         call maxwell1(ux,nppm,i1,n,vt)
00274         call maxwell1(uy,nppm,i1,n,vt)
00275         call maxwell1(uz,nppm,i1,n,vt)
00276         call scramble_v(i1,n)   ! remove x,y,z correlations
00277      else
00278         call cold_start(i1,n)
00279      endif
00280 
00281   case(2)  ! drift with vt
00282         ux(i1:i1+n-1) = vt
00283         uy(i1:i1+n-1) = 0.
00284         uz(i1:i1+n-1) = 0.
00285 
00286   case(3)  ! radial velocity spread
00287      do i = 1, n
00288         p = i + i1-1
00289         xt = x(p)-plasma_centre(1)
00290         yt = y(p)-plasma_centre(2)
00291         zt = z(p)-plasma_centre(3)
00292 
00293         rt = sqrt(xt**2 + yt**2 + zt**2)
00294 ! Set velocity direction according to position vector from plasma centre
00295         ux(p) = vt*xt/rt
00296         uy(p) = vt*yt/rt
00297         uz(p) = vt*zt/rt
00298      end do
00299 
00300   end select velocities
00301 
00302   ! zero fields
00303   Ex(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00304   Ey(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00305   Ez(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00306   Bx(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00307   By(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00308   Bz(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00309   Ax(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00310   Ay(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00311   Az(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00312   Axo(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00313   Ayo(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00314   Azo(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00315   pot(i1:i1+n-1) = 0
00316   work(i1:i1+n-1) = 1.   ! set work load balanced initially
00317 
00318   if (start_debug) then
00319         write(ipefile,'(a/(i6,8f15.5,i6))') "Initial particle positions, velocities:", &
00320           (i,x(i),y(i),z(i),ux(i),uy(i),uz(i),q(i),m(i),pelabel(i),i=i1,i1+n-1)
00321   endif
00322 end subroutine plasma_start
00323
